Name: Train Mechanic Simulator VR
About the game: Take your chances as a real train mechanic in VR. Find locomotives in need of help and repair them in one of the 3 workshops located in a vast open world covering the area of over 6,000 acres. You will face all kinds of damages in all sorts of trains: diesel, electric and even old-school steam units. - 9 trains to repair from all 3 types: steam, electric and diesel - 6,000 acres of an open world full of railways and various locations - 3 workshops with more than 1,000 parts to repair - unique economy system â€“ decide on the strategy of repairs and their return on investment
